item.title: A new spin crossover FeII coordination environment in a two-fold interpenetrated 3-D Hofmann-type framework material
item.description:
Chem. Commun., 2020, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D0CC07326A, Communication
Manan Ahmed, Zixi Xie, Shannon Thoonen, Carol Hua, Cameron J. Kepert, Jason R. Price, Suzanne M. Neville
Spin-crossover is observed for the first time in a FeII(py)3(NC⋯)3 coordination environment which arises in a two-fold interpenetrated 3-D Hofmann-like framework.
